course.title: PSY 3128 The Psychology of Ageing (3 units)
course.desc: Psychological processes of late adulthood. Sensory processes, attention, memory, learning, intelligence, personality, interpersonal relationships, coping strategies, mental health issues, depression, dementia, interventions of the clinical psychologist. Current research in the psychology of ageing.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: 54 university units including PSY 1101, PSY 1102.
